Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Danya
Reviews.Content: I received my order as stated! I'm loving my new iPhone 5: it was brand new sealed in a box everything was included.

Reviews.Title: i regret my purchase
Reviews.Author: samuel
Reviews.Content: phone is all its says it is EXCEPT THEY FORGOT TO MENTION THE MAIN DEFECT IT HASpower button DOESN'T work. I'm very much frustrated with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Greatest iPhone EVER!
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: I have owned a white iphone 5 and a black iphone 5. I loved them both! The charger can be plugged in both ways, the phone is way thinner than the last iphone, and it has a retina display. The pictures are crazy good, the new operating system is great, and the headphones are amazing!!! 6 stars!

Reviews.Title: No SIM Card
Reviews.Author: TheTruth
Reviews.Content: The phone is cool but, I am unable to use it yet until I can find a SIM Card, which is a pain. I wish it was stated that there was no SIM Card before I had purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Still a good phone
Reviews.Author: ChrisH
Reviews.Content: Not a ton different than the 4s, but still a great phone! It still does everything I like, just a little bit faster

Reviews.Title: Great service!
Reviews.Author: Kaneitra
Reviews.Content: Phone was better than i expected for a used phone. Pretty much looks brand new and i love it! Thanks!

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Shannon
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone now 2 years, haven't had a single issue with it. and was easy for sprint to add to my plan!

Reviews.Title: Saved a lot of Money and Very Professional
Reviews.Author: D. Nadolski
Reviews.Content: I had my iPhone stolen and Sprint was trying to shake me down for an "upgrade fee" even though I wasn't upgrading my 4S... until I did.  I got this iPhone and it is 10x better than my 4S.  Not only that, but the person who sold this to me was EXTREMELY PROFESSIONAL. I was so happy for his service that I promised myself I would write him a review because it was well deserved.  I plan on taking this phone to another company (not sprint), and this phone will set me free.  AppleTech Trader was quick, efficient, professional and I would definitely recommend working with them.  Thank you!!!

Reviews.Title: Unable to use as it is Locked.
Reviews.Author: rajesh
Reviews.Content: Description says it is unlocked. But I am not able to use the phone with other carrier outside USA. It is quite disappointing as it is not as described in terms of the lock/unlock. I am helpless now as I am already outside USA.

Reviews.Title: If you live in NH, don't get an iPhone with Sprint!
Reviews.Author: Robert Browne
Reviews.Content: If you're moving to New Hampshire, I do recommend using Sprint for cell service.I've been a customer of Sprint's for 13 years and received a threatening letter from them, today, telling me that, (all of sudden) I am using too many roaming minutes on our two phones. I checked the phones and saw that, as I thought, data roaming was not turned on. I called Sprint and was told that although data roaming on iPhones may be turned off, it still uses data roaming and that you have to turn ALL roaming off. Seriously?! We live in the woods and I need my phone. The problem isn't with too much voice roaming, just data, but I can't use voice, either?! Nonsense! This is a problem between Sprint and Apple, not me. Sprint sold me the phones, Sprint sold the plan at this address, and now Sprint is mad because we're using the phones.Screw them, they can go ahead and drop me, I'll go to one of their competitors who are doing a better job than they are, in terms of coverage, anyway.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: Carl Lands
Reviews.Content: First off the phone was is worse condition than described. Second the phone only worked on wifi, when I was not on wifi I could not access the internet or get text messages. I wasted money on this item and will never buy from this seller again

Reviews.Title: Future in the palm of your hands
Reviews.Author: Max
Reviews.Content: This phone is a great product. Many features too offer and the appearance is great. This was a gift for my mom and she love it

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: icilda morrison
Reviews.Content: It very good it told a minute to get here but it was worth it I would buy another one if I could

Reviews.Title: Cool
Reviews.Author: michael baror
Reviews.Content: Ok phone said used like new it was brand new no scratch nothing only a little dirty took a towel whipped it down looked great was very happy but didn't come with a sim had to get 1 from store as well the cable that came with it didn't charge but these things are small phone was great and came with new head phones and box and everything very happy

Reviews.Title: Great Item, but no SIM card
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: Item was in great condition came as expected although it came with NO SIM CARD, but for the price I paid Im sure I can figure out how to get it activated to sprint

Reviews.Title: Yup
Reviews.Author: jaron Strem
Reviews.Content: I Got it quickly and the product was brand new. I lost my iphone 4 and did not have an upgrade through my carrier. This was a way better option than buying from the carrier.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 5
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: The phone is great, using it now to type this review. Unfortunately I had problems with getting the 3G to activate initially with sprint, but I the phone it to apple and they swapped it immediately and all works just fine now!

Reviews.Title: Great phone, I should have asked about SIM
Reviews.Author: R. MCRACKAN
Reviews.Content: The phone itself gets a 5/5. The seller gets a qualified 5/5. Phone arrived quickly, in perfect new condition, and with all promised accessories. The qualification, and the reason the overall experience was 4/5, is that there was no SIM card. Buying an after market Sprint SIM card proved extremely difficult. Apple, Best Buy, Radio Shack, Sprint retail store, and Sprint repair shop all said that they only have Sprint SIMs available for repairs, not for direct sale. When I finally found somewhere that sold one, 2 of the 3 staff thought they didn't sell it (they too thought it was just for repairs) so I got quite a runaround. So my setup experience was horrible, but everything else was great and has been great ever since.

Reviews.Title: IT IS SUPPOSED TO BE UNLOCK BUT IT ISNT
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Description says it is unlocked. But I am not able to use the phone with other carrier outside USA. Now Im not able to use it.Now I have to pay to unlocked it, and what can I do NOW? I need and answer please

Reviews.Title: Make sure you're already with sprint!
Reviews.Author: Robert Smith
Reviews.Content: I would have liked it better if I didn't have to traded in for iPhone 5s to start a contract with Sprint

Reviews.Title: Phone is great, the accessories not so much
Reviews.Author: Bridget C Garwood
Reviews.Content: My apple iphone5 works wonderfully and is everything I had hoped for. But the accessories it came with, not so much. The charger cord wouldn't charge my phone and kept giving me error messages when I would plug it into my computer. I had to go purchase a new one at the Apple store. I guess with the new ios7 update on the iphone 5, this has been happening to a few people who have non-certified Apple products. Seems like sort of a rip off, if you ask me, it should matter where the charger came from. But, then again it's Apple, I guess that's what I bought into.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Douglas J Hodgson
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because the phone itself is not what I expected... I was expecting something more on the lines of a phone I could use . and this phone is almost like it never showed up its true potential. I wish I had higher praise for the phone but it didn't show up at my door with the right experience I was looking for... almost as if I never received it... the features im sure are great so it would  be great to actually talk on one of these phones some day.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 5 is GSM and you can unlock with Gevey?
Reviews.Author: Raul
Reviews.Content: iPhone 5 is GSM and you can unlock with Gevey?let me know because I'm interested and use it in Venezuela

Reviews.Title: Informations
Reviews.Author: João
Reviews.Content: Hello,I am interested in the iPhone. I want to buy it.After buying unlock it whit CYDIA or otherwise, but want to know if it is blocked by IMEI. Is this?The iPhone has a problem? Let me know.If not, I will buy.Thank you.http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B009F9Q2U4?ie=UTF8&seller;=A1NPN2M4OAVGMZ&sn;=KYGABYTES

Reviews.Title: It was not what I wanted to order
Reviews.Author: Martin DESSU
Reviews.Content: I wrongly order this phone, i was tried to order unblock phone, unfortunately, it is more difficult for me to replace

Reviews.Title: ANSWER ME PLEASE??
Reviews.Author: Katiusca
Reviews.Content: Hi i want to buy this iphone tommoroow? But can u let me know if it is unlock or i have to unlocked it?

ProductInfo.Features:
With the iPhone 5, Apple equips this smartphone with a larger 4-inch retina display, adds 4G LTE high-speed data, and includes a faster A6 processor
Features global roaming, Siri voice assistant, AirPlay media streaming, an 8-megapixel camera with HD recording, and a HD front facing camera
This model comes with 16 GB of internal storage and supports WiFi connectivity
The iPhone 5 offers a slim and stylish design that is both lightweight and easy to carry
Offer includes US Cable and Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: Apple iPhone 5 16GB 4G LTE Black - Sprint
